```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

read_excel(
  here::here("data", "schedule.xlsx")
) %>% 
  slice(-2) %>% 
  separate(Date, c("Week", "Date"), " - ") %>% 
  #mutate(Week = Date) %>% 
  #mutate(Date = str_split(Date, "  -"))
  knitr::kable()
```
